name: Genasi
description: Genasi are planetouched humanoids whose bloodlines are infused with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water. Each Genasi carries the traits of their elemental heritage, manifesting in their appearance and abilities. They are often seen as walking embodiments of their respective element, with personalities to match.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Primordial.
special: Elemental Affinity: You have resistance to a specific damage type depending on your elemental ancestry (e.g., Fire Genasi have resistance to fire damage).
